013package org.apache.juneau.cp;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
016
017import java.util.*;
018
019import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
020
021/**
022 * A list of default settings.
023 *
024 * <p>
025 * Consists of a simple string-keyed map of arbitrary objects.
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
028 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe.
029 * </ul>
030 *
031 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
032 * </ul>
033 */
034public class DefaultSettingsMap {
035
036   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
037   // Static
038   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
039
040   /**
041    * Static creator.
042    *
043    * @return A new object.
044    */
045   public static DefaultSettingsMap create() {
046      return new DefaultSettingsMap();
047   }
048
049   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
050   // Instance
051   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
052
053   private final Map<String,Object> entries;
054
055   /**
056    * Constructor.
057    */
058   protected DefaultSettingsMap() {
059      entries = map();
060   }
061
062   /**
063    * Copy constructor
064    *
065    * @param value The object to copy.
066    */
067   public DefaultSettingsMap(DefaultSettingsMap value) {
068      entries = copyOf(value.entries);
069   }
070
071   /**
072    * Sets the specified setting value.
073    *
074    * @param name The setting name.
075    * @param value The setting value.
076    * @return This object.
077    */
078   public DefaultSettingsMap set(String name, Object value) {
079      entries.put(name, value);
080      return this;
081   }
082
083   /**
084    * Returns the value of the specified setting if it exists.
085    *
086    * @param <T> The return type.
087    * @param type The setting type.
088    * @param name The setting name.
089    * @return The setting value.
090    */
091   @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
092   public <T> Optional<T> get(Class<T> type, String name) {
093      return Utils.opt((T)entries.get(name));
094   }
095
096   /**
097    * Creates a copy of this map.
098    *
099    * @return A copy of this map.
100    */
101   public DefaultSettingsMap copy() {
102      return new DefaultSettingsMap(this);
103   }
104}
